typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Offer_Surrogate_ID as long,
		ID as long,
		OFFER as string,
		Current_OFFER as string,
		COUPON_INDICATOR as string,
		Current_COUPON_INDICATOR as string,
		OFFER_TYPE as string,
		Current_OFFER_TYPE as string,
		BUY_QUANTITY as double,
		Current_BUY_QUANTITY as double,
		GET_QUANTITY as double,
		Current_GET_QUANTITY as double,
		COUPON_SCAN_CODE as long,
		Current_COUPON_SCAN_CODE as long,
		OFFER_SEGMENT as string,
		Current_OFFER_SEGMENT as string,
		OFFER_PROGRAM as string,
		Current_OFFER_PROGRAM as string,
		OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE as string,
		Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE as string,
		OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS as integer,
		Current_OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS as integer,
		OFFER_AWARD_POINTS as integer,
		Current_OFFER_AWARD_POINTS as integer,
		OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY as integer,
		Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY as integer,
		OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		Current_OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		OFFER_REASON as string,
		Current_OFFER_REASON as string,
		OFFER_MULTIPLE as integer,
		Current_OFFER_MULTIPLE as integer,
		PRICE_TYPE as string,
		Current_PRICE_TYPE as string,
		DELETED_OFFER as string,
		Current_DELETED_OFFER as string,
		HOT_OFFER as string,
		Current_HOT_OFFER as string,
		LAST_CHANGED as string,
		LAST_DML as integer,
		EFF_START_DT as date,
		EFF_END_DT as date,
		IsActive as integer,
		CRC_VAL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Internal/LDW/Parquet/Offer&Promotion-DIM/OFFER/Temp/*.parquet']) ~> SaleTypeMultipleParquetFiles
SaleTypeMultipleParquetFiles sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Offer_Surrogate_Id as long,
		ID as long,
		Offer as string,
		Current_Offer as string,
		Coupon_Indicator as string,
		Current_Coupon_Indicator as string,
		Offer_Type as string,
		Current_Offer_Type as string,
		Buy_Quantity as double,
		Current_Buy_Quantity as double,
		Get_Quantity as double,
		Current_Get_Quantity as double,
		Coupon_Scan_Code as long,
		Current_Coupon_Scan_Code as long,
		Offer_Segment as string,
		Current_Offer_Segment as string,
		Offer_Program as string,
		Current_Offer_Program as string,
		Offer_Threshold_Type as string,
		Current_Offer_Threshold_Type as string,
		Offer_Redemption_Points as integer,
		Current_Offer_Redemption_Points as integer,
		Offer_Award_Points as integer,
		Current_Offer_Award_Points as integer,
		Offer_Threshold_Quantity as integer,
		Current_Offer_Threshold_Quantity as integer,
		Offer_Source_System as string,
		Current_Offer_Source_System as string,
		Offer_Reason as string,
		Current_Offer_Reason as string,
		Offer_Multiple as integer,
		Current_Offer_Multiple as integer,
		Price_Type as string,
		Current_Price_Type as string,
		Deleted_Offer as string,
		Current_Deleted_Offer as string,
		Hot_Offer as string,
		Current_Hot_Offer as string,
		Last_Changed as string,
		Last_Dml as integer,
		Eff_Start_Dt as date,
		Eff_End_Dt as date,
		IsActive as integer,
		Crc_Val as string
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['DIM_OFFER.parquet'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Offer_Surrogate_Id = Offer_Surrogate_ID,
		ID,
		Offer = OFFER,
		Current_Offer = Current_OFFER,
		Coupon_Indicator = COUPON_INDICATOR,
		Current_Coupon_Indicator = Current_COUPON_INDICATOR,
		Offer_Type = OFFER_TYPE,
		Current_Offer_Type = Current_OFFER_TYPE,
		Buy_Quantity = BUY_QUANTITY,
		Current_Buy_Quantity = Current_BUY_QUANTITY,
		Get_Quantity = GET_QUANTITY,
		Current_Get_Quantity = Current_GET_QUANTITY,
		Coupon_Scan_Code = COUPON_SCAN_CODE,
		Current_Coupon_Scan_Code = Current_COUPON_SCAN_CODE,
		Offer_Segment = OFFER_SEGMENT,
		Current_Offer_Segment = Current_OFFER_SEGMENT,
		Offer_Program = OFFER_PROGRAM,
		Current_Offer_Program = Current_OFFER_PROGRAM,
		Offer_Threshold_Type = OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE,
		Current_Offer_Threshold_Type = Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE,
		Offer_Redemption_Points = OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS,
		Current_Offer_Redemption_Points = Current_OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS,
		Offer_Award_Points = OFFER_AWARD_POINTS,
		Current_Offer_Award_Points = Current_OFFER_AWARD_POINTS,
		Offer_Threshold_Quantity = OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY,
		Current_Offer_Threshold_Quantity = Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY,
		Offer_Source_System = OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		Current_Offer_Source_System = Current_OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		Offer_Reason = OFFER_REASON,
		Current_Offer_Reason = Current_OFFER_REASON,
		Offer_Multiple = OFFER_MULTIPLE,
		Current_Offer_Multiple = Current_OFFER_MULTIPLE,
		Price_Type = PRICE_TYPE,
		Current_Price_Type = Current_PRICE_TYPE,
		Deleted_Offer = DELETED_OFFER,
		Current_Deleted_Offer = Current_DELETED_OFFER,
		Hot_Offer = HOT_OFFER,
		Current_Hot_Offer = Current_HOT_OFFER,
		Last_Changed = LAST_CHANGED,
		Last_Dml = LAST_DML,
		Eff_Start_Dt = EFF_START_DT,
		Eff_End_Dt = EFF_END_DT,
		IsActive,
		Crc_Val = CRC_VAL
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkItemFinal
